article.description: Sam Houston St. 71, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 53
article.headline: Sam Houston St. 71, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 53
article.linkText: Sam Houston St. 71, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 53
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas (AP) -- Shamir McDaniel scored 19 points, including 5-of-8 3-pointers, to help lead Sam Houston State to a 71-53 win over Texas A&M-Corpus Christi on Saturday night. The game was tied eight times with 13 lead changes before the Bearkats went ahead to stay 36-35 on a free throw by John Gardiner with 16:37 to play. From that point, Sam Houston State outscored the Islanders 35-18, shooting almost 57 percent in the second half. McDaniel hit consecutive 3-pointers within 17 seconds to give the Bearkats a 59-45 lead with 4:22 to play. He led four players in double figures for the Bearkats (18-4, 6-3 Southland). Ryan Bright scored 15 points and pulled down 10 boards. DeLuis Ramirez added 12 points, and John Gardiner had 10. Justin Reynolds led the Islanders (6-15, 3-5) with 17 points. Kevin Perkins added 11.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
